answers.answer: They say movements usually slow down.. because they save their energy for labor process. But I know how you feel that.  I've got 2 days left. Just want to carry my baby in my arms! Rather than my womb. Lol.

oh wow... i suppose its different for every women. my cousin said the night before she went into labour that he was really active for her.urggh wow 2 days for you! not long at all. id rather be there than my ten days!!best of luck tho hun x
I have 19 days left and my baby's movement has slowed down. Hopeing she comes soon! I can't wait to hold her!

see my baby boy has just become more and more active and i have 10 days left.we all seem the same tho wanting our little babys in our arms now. ive been impatient throughout all my pregnancy but i have to say that the last month has been the hardest!! this last week is dragging sooo much xx
This last no the has been dragging on! I just want her here already. Lol
No the should be month. Stupid phone lol

My baby has been really quiet today. And I'm feeling like I got to poo.. nothing coming out.. mild cramps/inconsistent contractions. Going to try the pineapple method lol.. maybe that'll get my contractions going stronger.

Im ready for my boy to be here to the point im moody and just mad as heck i just wanna go to l&d and demand thet take him out now but i also was told yesterday i may have preeclampsia and they may have to deliver nexxt week they did blood work yesterday were supposed to call today and didnt i had to call three times befoee someone told me what was going on now they say i don't haveit and i have more than 3 symptoms these drs are idiots im judt so frustrstedwant him here and not to have to deal with theses people anymore

aww. it is a good thing not having preclampsia because ive heard its not pleasant. whats getting me thrue this last long 10 days is the reason hes not here yet is because hes not ready. and he is getting stronger and developing better each day he is still inside me. as frustrating as it is that hes soo close hes touching but its not a cuddle is it lol.wouldnt worry. i used to moan it was going slow forme before this last month. now ive forgotten that and this is the real slow part! xx

Yeah my son has been pretty sluggish alil he's moving but sleeping most of the time.. I'm 39+5 I've been having stomach cramps losing a lot of my mucus plug and I had my bloody show... Now I'm just waiting

Im 39 wks now.... my baby girl moves a lot more then before. I was at the hospital today trying to ask a Dr. For an induction, but nurse told me to wait. :/ i just want my baby out in my arms, these last weeks seems to never end.  Frustrated!
oh glad im not on my own feeling this way.do women always lose their mucus plugs? i havnt lost mine yet and im 3 days away from being 39w xx

question: did anybody notice a change in the amount of movement before they went into labour?ive noticed since being in my 38th week that my boy has become alot more cheeky and active.maybe im just looking for something to say im going to have him soon because i just really want to meet him now. i feel as tho ive been pregnant for years! :-)
title: approaching labour...
